snippet.title: Never Not Shooting Trailer
snippet.description:
Never Not Shooting is a 4 player cooperative local multiplayer enemy-hell game inspired by classic arcade style action with a focus on competing for high scores. Join together with up to three other people in this cooperative experience while you try and defend the energy core from an ever mounting wave of enemy forces. Choose between a wide selection of customizable weapons and special abilities as you and your friends create the ultimate team combination for maximum destruction.

How long will your team be able to survive?

https://handcannongames.itch.io/never-not-shooting
